title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.40 - U-turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.40 - U-turns

State Regulations
(a) The making of a
U-turn at any point within the parkway system is prohibited. Excepted from the
provisions of this section are: (1)
operators
of authorized emergency vehicles; (2)
operators of authority
vehicles; (3)
operators of
authorized construction, maintenance, repair and towing vehicles. (b) Operators of such excepted
vehicles shall make crossings in such manner as not to create a hazard to other
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
